author: stevel
msg: move to constants to define policy strings; change so that ignore loads print out something at -v level. Why so? to debug antlib namespace declarations.

author: stevel
msg: This is an official contrib of the smartfrog tourl task to the apache codebase; its aim has been to set up rmic classpaths, but it turns out to use maven2 its kind of convenient to be able to turn any location into a file: url. That is only, what, 3 lines of code, but what this task does is bulk conversion and a set of unit tests that work.
Docs are to be xdoc generated
